introduce_product:
December 2019 marks the 25th birthday of the BABY-G watch for active women, an occasion that will be celebrated with the special re-issuance of the very first BABY-G.
This model is a re-issue of the first DW-520 in block colors that capture the fashion of the ’90s. Bold green, purple, and pink hues create a neo-retro design. A face protector and the G logo on the face reproduce the style of the original model for a real nostalgic look.
list_specification_product: Selectable illumination duration (1.5 seconds or 3 seconds), afterglow
29 time zones (48 cities), daylight saving on/off
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown start time setting range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
- Regular timekeeping: Hour, minute, second, am/pm, date, day
- Approx. battery life: 3 years on CR1616
